nodes.text: The 419th Infantry was a military unit within the Galactic Empire, stationed on Talus during the Galactic Civil War.

Established by the logistics team of the 419th, the outpost served proudly in operation against the Rebel Alliance in the Corellian system. The strike force organized from the outpost was large enough to require high levels of organization. Several officers were assigned to 419th because of their expertise with scout walker vehicles. Many of them were also decorated for their actions in the suppression of the Binayre Pirates.
